name: My Real Life Hallmark Movie
description:
You can play My Real Life Hallmark Movie in your browser here!

In the year 2021, Black Veil Brides is coming out with a new album, the new MacGyver TV show is still as popular as ever, and Donald Trump is somehow still the President of the United States. But most importantly, in the year 2021, Bailey Johnson is starting her own horse therapy business—White Willow Retreat.

After an unlikely turn of events, Andy Biersack, Angus MacGyver, and Donald Trump all end up at White Willow Retreat. With the help of her best friend Mandy, Bailey will have to navigate her complicated feelings for these men... and maybe even end up with one of them.

If you love watching Hallmark movies, or maybe just enjoy making fun of their cliche plot lines, then My Real Life Hallmark Movie is for you! With 3 endings for each love interest, plus 2 bonus endings, this cheesy dating sim should be enough to keep you entertained until the holiday season is finally here :)

Warning: My Real Life Hallmark Movie contains a couple of scenes that may be triggering to certain people. If you'd like a list of potential triggers, please read the Content Warning PDF below.
